= Current Project Status of HBase-Writer =

Currently HBase-Writer has 2 active branches (to match the hbase project)

* /trunk

* /branches/0.18

/trunk supports hadoop-trunk and hbase-trunk.

/branches/0.18 supports hadoop-0.18.X and hbase-0.18.X

All branches work with Heritrix 2.0.X.
